titles.title: Congratulating the on-premises sign industry for its contributions to the success of small businesses on the occasion of its 62nd Annual International Sign Expo.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 5/1/2008--Introduced. Congratulates the members of the on-premises sign and sign products industry on their 62nd Annual International Sign Expo and encourages the on-premises sign industry to continue events such as the Expo to educate the small business community and the general public about the benefits of effective signage.
